com.paypal.selion.utils

Class SauceConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.SauceConfigReader

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class SauceConfigReader
extends Object
    A configuration utility that is internally used by SeLion to parse sauce configuration json file.

        public static final String AUTHENTICATION_KEY
        Required. Credentials to connect to sauce labs.

      • SAUCE_URL

        public static final String SAUCE_URL
        Required. REST endpoint to communicate with sauce labs.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAUCE_TIMEOUT

        public static final String SAUCE_TIMEOUT
        Optional. Connection time out for communicating with sauce labs api. Defaults to DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAUCE_RETRY

        public static final String SAUCE_RETRY
        Optional. Connection retry for communicating with sauce labs api. Defaults to DEFAULT_RETRY_COUNT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String PARENT_TUNNEL
        Optional. Default parent tunnel to use. Defaults to DEFAULT_TUNNEL

        public static final String REQUIRE_USER_CREDENTIALS
        Optional. Whether a user must provide their own sauce labs api credentials. Defaults to false

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SauceConfigReader getInstance()
        Returns:
        a SauceConfigReader object that can be used to retrieve values from the Configuration object as represented by the JSON file. Throws a GridConfigurationException on instance load error.

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate()
        Invalidates the current Sauce config and causes it to reload from disk at next getInstance() call

      • getAuthenticationKey

        public String getAuthenticationKey()
        Returns:
        the access key associated with the saucelabs account

      • getSauceURL

        public String getSauceURL()
        Returns:
        the sauceURL specified in the configuration file

        public String getUserName()
        Returns:
        the sauce labs user name

      • getApiKey

        public String getApiKey()
        Returns:
        the sauce labs api key

      • getURL

        public String getURL()
        Returns:
        the fully qualified sauce url

      • getSauceTimeout

        public int getSauceTimeout()
        Returns:
        the timeout in milleseconds for sauce

      • getSauceRetry

        public int getSauceRetry()
        Returns:
        the number of retries with sauce

      • getDefaultParentTunnel

        public String getDefaultParentTunnel()
        Returns:
        the default sauce parent-tunnel to use

      • getDefaultTunnelIdentifier

        public String getDefaultTunnelIdentifier()
        Returns:
        the default sauce tunnel to use

      • isRequireUserCredentials

        public boolean isRequireUserCredentials()
        Returns:
        true/false whether the client MUST specify their own sauce API credentials (username/accessKey)
